questions.question_text: Jay Swāminārāyan, jay Akşharpurushottam, Aksharpurushottam jay, darshan _____... Jay Swāminārāyaṇ...
questions.explanation: The line from the aarti is 'darshan sarvottam'.

questions.question_text: Purushottam Parabrahma, Shrīhari Sahajānand, Aksharbrahma anādi, _____... Jay Swāminārayan... 2
questions.explanation: The line from the aarti is 'Aksharbrahma anādi, Guņātītānand'.

questions.question_text: Dāsbhāv divyatā sah, brahmarūpe prīti, Suhrudbhāv alaukik, sthāpit shubh rīti... Jay Swāminārayan... 4
questions.explanation: This quote is from the Aarti.

questions.question_text: Antaryāmi parātparam hita-karam, sarvoparī Shri Hari, Sākāram Parabrahma sarva-sharaņam, kartā _____;
questions.explanation: The line from the Asthak is 'kartā dayā-sāgaram'.

questions.question_text: Sākşhād Aksharadhāma divya paramam, sevāratam mūrtimān, Sarvādhāra sadā svaroma-vivare, _____;
questions.explanation: The line from the Asthak is 'Sarvādhāra sadā svaroma-vivare, brahmānda-koţī-dharam'.

questions.question_text: Shriman-nirguņa-mūrti sundara tanu, adhyātma-vārtā-ratam, Dehātīta dashā akhanda-bhajanam, shāntam kshamā-sāgaram;
questions.explanation: This quote is from the Asthak.

questions.question_text: Āgnā-pālana-tatparam guna-grahī, nirdosha-mūrti svayam, Vande Prāgaji-Bhakta-pāda-kamalam, _____ gurum.
questions.explanation: The line from the Asthak is 'Vande Prāgaji-Bhakta-pāda-kamalam, brahmaswarūpam gurum'.

questions.question_text: Shuddhopāsana mandiram su-rachanam, siddhānta-rakshāparam, Sansthā-sthāpana divya-kārya-karaņam, sevāmayam jīvanam;
questions.explanation: This quote is from the Asthak.

questions.question_text: Vāṇī amruta-pūrṇa harsha-karaṇī, sanjīvanī mādhurī, Divyam druşhți-pradāna divya hasanam, divyam _____;
questions.explanation: The line from the Asthak is 'Divyam druşhți-pradāna divya hasanam, divyam shubham kīrtanam'.

questions.question_text: Vishve Vaidika dharma marma mahimā, satsanga vistārakam, Vātsalyam karuņā aho jana-jane, akarshaņam adbhutam;
questions.explanation: This quote is from the Asthak.
